content.label: Nice game but when I lose I need to start all over again and it’s just slow and boring at the beginning
Art and music are both lovely. Game mechanics are novel but still feel familiar. This is game design done right!
This game is awesome really it is its fun and entertaining and it is a really nice love story but please upgrade it because I have the latest update and it is a little buggy.
I couldn't get through enough of this game to witness the "moving story," as the gameplay is incredibly boring. Not worth the money, get Year Walk or another Simogo game instead.
I wasted $2.99 for this?
I love this game

So I'm not a huge fan of endless games but there are a couple I play. This game couldn't hold my attention for a full 5 minutes. Completely bored by the gameplay the (supposed) story and lack of accomplishment.

why are you sitting there reading reviews? YOU HAVE TO BUY THIS APP!  It's a fun app, but it also has a story behind it. Not many apps have that.  THIS APP WILL CHANGE YOUR LIFE! Probably not, but I feel that saying that makes it some what sound better so...
A real bummer of a game not worth the price

title.label: fun but impossible to achieve anything

content.label: no progress is ever really made while playing this game. seems impossible to avoid the 'pitfalls' and there aren't any tips provided for how to improve.  overall and in the end it's only just mindless, pointless entertainment - so if that's all you want then easy fun can be had. I can only waste my time for so long before I'm expecting more.
In this app you can even change the language right from the menu. This app is great for children AND adults. I definitely recommend this app.

title.label: Best endless game on the market

content.label: Super fun game! Way better take on the endless road than anything I have played to date. Amazing story as well!
It’s cute, but $3? I know some people love this game, and I love other games like Infinity Blade and such, so this game was boring for me. Don’t waist your cash.

title.label: What a fantastic idea for a game........

content.label:
I've been saying a lot lately about how one gaming company comes out with a game that is so familiar and so alike other games. It'So today is the BIG Day, huh? I've had this iPad for several years now and I have yet to use F/T once. You will see how horrible I look and why I HAVEN'T used 
F/T. But I've decided that this puss is the one God wants me to have (I'm going to have a looooong talk with God about a lot of things when I get there.....both good and bad). 😇s like how many times can you say it? Received?
The nice thing is is that this game is DIFFERENT,  it' s fun, endearing  and a time-passer. I love HOG's, but I'm actually sleepy from sleeping thru long-term games.This is a time passer of games, came highly recommended and is lots of fun!
This game is honestly not that good. All you have to do is control the car and that's it. This should have been 99 scents.
Its a great app an all but the problem is that u can only go as fast as the screen moves as your car goes

Any charm this game may have hoped to generate is lost due to the frustrating control scheme and severely limited replayability.

Do yourself a favor and spend the $2.99 on a salted caramel mocha instead.

title.label: Good game but it changed languages on me

content.label: It's a good leisure game, but I went to play it today and it is now in a completely different language with no way to change it back to English! I am not happy about this!

title.label: An ok game but a little to much for it

content.label: It's a fun game but it's not an attention keeper, the art style is fantastic and the game play is iffy at best it's fun game if have kids that play on your device. If the price was 99¢ it would have gotten 4 stars
Great use of the iPad's touch screen! Can you please add summer and winter to the evergreen ride section? Again, addictive and amazing (like all of Simogo's games)

Graphics are very charming but game play will bore you quickly. 
You just make the road 'wavy' with touch control and the car putts along collecting little tokens. 
I gave it one star for the look but that's all this app has going for it. 
Should have been a 99 cent app at most.

Ok this game is so cute. If you don't know, it is about the love story of a couple. Don't worry, nothing inappropriate. No suggestive scenes or anything, for what I have seen so far. Every time you earn a photo, and open memory lane, (the place where you can view the photos you earned, and the photos are the story how they met) the French romance music plays and your just like AWWWWWWWWWW. The music is beastly awesome and u must get it to understand my amazement. PLZ GET THIS APP!
this game is so fun I'm way ahead of my sister with the picture thingy😈
a definitely 5 star. Hope you can bring us some new track and elements!

When I first saw this game, what attracted me was both the visuals and soundtrack. These are indeed what I enjoy most about it. The Memory Lane is not what I expected, but touching and satisfying. It is the most I've spent on an app, but the creators deserve it. Simply visit their website; their effort and dedication to their fan base is evident. Innovative developers like these should be supported. The asking price is understandable; they aren't a huge operation, it seems. There are two main modes: Evergreen Ride and Sunday Trip. I found Evergreen Ride most enjoyable, for the photos you collect are the draw for me. The controls aren't perfect, but their what set this app apart from its competition. I would like to see Winter as an option for Evergreen Ride. That would make me very happy.

title.label: So lame. Boring! I don't get the great reviews.

content.label:
Maybe this is a game for kids, otherwise it is singularly one of the least exciting least interesting games I've played. I think the graphics are cute, thus the two stars. 

I played the three game episodes, in the different modes and was shocked by how bored I was. I immediately deleted after the first time I played. 

If it were .99 cents, I wouldn't feel so bad about buying it. But when I compare this to other $3 games, it is a joke! What did I pay for? The graphics are cute, but completely repetitive.

EDIT: PLEASE consider adding a Year Walk Wintery level to Bumpy Roady. It'd be a nice scenery change! Thanks. Can't wait to play YW.

Review title says it all. This is a brilliant little game. Simple, addictive, and like many reviewers online have said, it's a metaphorical comforting experience that you just want to dive into and never leave! Well worth the money for just one mode, let alone 2 plus a bonus. 

Beautiful crafted with love and meant to tak you for a drive right into the heart of something grander than you might think.

Can't wait for Year Walk!
Simogo ❤
I never write reviews ! But u guys deserve one , fun game
It is cute, fun, addicting, and simple! Everything you need to make a perfect app! It never glitches up either! I recommend this app to everyone! 😃 💟 👍 👏
Terrible

title.label: Love the game; don't love starting over from square one...

content.label: This is a great little game--very addictive!  But you know what would make it better?  If you had the option of resuming from the last place you dropped off the road. It's really frustrating to have to start at the beginning every time. Other than that, it's just beautifully designed and challenging enough to keep you busy!
in need of a iphone 5 update though

The most cutest game that i have ever seen and it is very simple it is very fun when you get to know the controls of the game the controls might look hard at first when you keep playing you will get the Hang if it
Very creative gameplay, engaging and simple.  Good time to spend some idle time!
Super cute & fun to play!!! Can't stop playing it. :D
Not even worth 3 dollars. Please nobody buy this game seriously. It is meant for 5 year olds

I can't remember the last time I wrote a review. But I've never felt more cheated of my money. Terribly boring...it's
Designed for a 5 year old...SERIOUSLY!
it seemed like this game would be fun but I thnk it's really boring its not worth the price at all and it is also is keeping logging off when I get in the game I just guess its too bad

The art and music are really well conceived. However, the gameplay is pretty boring. It really feels like one big grind to get all the photo frames for the story. I have played the story mode for 2 hours and I am about 50% completed on the story board. It's cute but the story so far has not been worth the time and grind due to a pretty wonky control system. I hope the story has a great ending that will make it worth my time to gather all the pieces.

I usually don't write reviews, but I couldn't help myself this time.

Despite what some people said, I found the controls to be easy to master, and they are so much fun.  Add in the sweet love story and adorable artwork, and I was won over.
I hated this app. It's boring. DO NOT BUY! It's tiring and music is annoying. For $2.99 it was NOT worth it.

This game is really good okay. Really good. But that's depending on many different things:

First of all, I thought this was a level game. It's not. It's just an endless game and you go racking up points.
What's the point of a $3 endless game you may ask? Why shouldn't I just get Temple Run for free because that game is endless and it's free.

That brings me to my second point.

SEMI-SPOILER
Although this game has very little to offer for $3 it brings so much more once you really look into it. Along the endless game (which, for a quick break, can be quite addicting), you see little picture frames, or memories. These picture frames tell a story, won't say any more. The reason this game loses a star, besides its ridiculous pricing, is that these picture frames are extremely difficult to encounter. You'll rarely find them at the beginning of the endless game, so if you lose a lot, it is almost impossible to complete the story. There is a substantial amount of picture frames so the game is probably worth it just for the amount of time you'll spend trying to uncover the story about *COUGH COUGH COUGH*

In short, it is a good game, and if you're looking for a good endless game, buy it.

At first I passed on this game because I felt the reviews didn't justify paying $2.99 for a game. 

After playing on a friends iPad I had to buy it for myself and I have to say...a beautiful stunning game.

There's the immediate challenge of actually going for the 'bumpy ride' but over time you get wrapped up in the amazing and lovely storyline that is at the heart of the trip. 

You really get into it and the mood behind each trip changes the more you find out about the couple. 

The makers behind this game are just genius. 

Please ignore the negative reviews! The controls aren't hard at all, just tricky like they should be. The game is fun and just challenging enough and the goal isn't points but just gettin to the end of the beautiful story.

Please please please make more levels with more stories f their life! This game DESERVES more levels and sequels!

Don't listen to all the bad reviews! Most of them are about "hard controls" and such, but it's a sort of hard game. Once you get the hang of the controls (it took me about 10 min to get used to it), the game is easy! The story is deep and romantic and sad, and overall, this is one of my favorites! Worth the price! I've suggested it to others and they have all loved it!
It is not fun at all.
Definitely worth the purchase. Something I notice that could be added is multi-touch, allowing to make multiple bumps in the road!

I am super cheap and hate spending more than 99 cents for an app, but I figured I would give this a try and I'm so glad I did. Some of the reviews said that the controls take too long to learn, but I think that mastering the controls is part of the fun. Music and visuals are great as well. I'd pick this game over a 3 dollar cup of coffee any day.

This game is much too difficult to control and just leads to frustration. While there is a goal to the game (collecting memories), unlocking them does not outweigh the trouble it takes to collect them. Definitely not worth the $2.99 that this over-hyped game costs.
I love the music and the graphics to this game. It's simply adorable. Totally worth the price.
